chapter.text: 21|1|Manusera hiseba-nikesera samaya asanna [1], athaca tara udasinataya mukha phiriye rayeche [2].
21|2|Yakhana'i tadera kache tadera rabera kono natuna upadesa ase [1] takhana tara ta sone kautukacchale [2]
21|3|tadera antara thake amanoyogi. Ara yara yalema tara gopane paramarsa kare. ‘E to tomadera mata ekajana manusa'i, tabu'o ki tomara dekhe sune jadura kabale parabe [1]?’
21|4|Tini balalena, ‘asamanasamuha o yaminera samasta katha'i amara rabera jana ache ebam tini'i sarbasrota, sarbajna [1].’

21|5|Baram tara bale, ‘esaba alika kalpana, haya se egulo ratana kareche, na haya se ekajana kabi [1]. Ata'eba se niye asuka amadera kache eka nidarsana yerupa nidarsanasaha prerita hayechila purbabartigana.
21|6|Edera age yesaba janapada amara dhbansa karechi sekhanakara adhibasira imana aneni; tabe ki tara imana anabe [1]
21|7|ara apanara age amara ohisaha purusaderake'i pathiyechilama [1]; sutaram yadi tomara na jana tabe jnaniderake jijnesa kara [2].
21|8|Ara amara taderake emana dehabisista karini ye, tara khabara grahana karata na; ara tara cirasthayi'o chila na [1].
21|9|Tarapara amara tadera prati krta oyada satya kare dekhalama, phale amara taderake o yaderake icche raksa karechilama ebam simalanghanakariderake karechilama dhbansa [1].
21|10|Amara to tomadera prati nayila karechi kitaba yate ache tomadera alocana, tabu'o ki tomara bujhabe na [1]
21|11|ara amara dhbansa karechi bahu janapada, yara adhibasira chila yalema ebam tadera pare srsti karechi an'ya jati.
21|12|Atahpara yakhana tara amadera sasti tera pela [1] takhana'i tara sekhana theke palate lagala.
21|13|‘Paliye ye'o na ebam phire eso yekhane tomara bilasitaya matta chile o tomadera abasagrhe, yate e bisaye tomaderake jijnesa kara haya [1].
21|14|Tara balala, ‘haya! Durbhoga amadera! Amara to chilama jalema [1].
21|15|Atahpara tadera e artanada calate thake amara taderake kata sasya o nebhano agunera mata na kara paryanta.
21|16|Ara asamana, yamina o ya etadubhayera madhye ache ta amara khelara chale srsti karini.
21|17|Amara yadi khelara upakarana grahana karate ca'itama tabe amara amadera kacha theke'i ta grahana karatama; kintu amara ta karini [1].

21|18|Baram amara satya dbara aghata hani mithyara upara; phale ta mithyake curna-bicurna kare deya ebam tatksanat mithya niscihna haye yaya [1]. Ara tomara allahake ye gune gunanbita karacha tara jan'ya rayeche tomadera durbhoga [2]
21|19|ara asamanasamuha o yamine yara ache tara tamra'i; ara tamra sannidhye yara ache [1] tara ahankara-base tamra ibadata kara hate bimukha haya na ebam birakti bodha kare na [2].
21|20|Tara dina-rata tamra pabitrata o mahima ghosana kare, tara klanta'o haya na [1].
21|21|Era yamina theke yeguloke ma’buda hisebe grahana kareche segulo ki mrtake jibita karate saksama [1]

21|22|yadi etadubhayera (asamana o yaminera) madhye allah byatita aro aneka ilaha thakata, tahale ubhaya'i bisrnkhala hata [1]. Ata'eba, tara ya barnana kare ta theke arasera adhipati allah kata'i na pabitra.
21|23|Tini ya karena se bisaye tini jijnasita habena na; baram taderake'i jijnasa kara habe.

21|24|Tara ki tamke chara bahu ilaha grahana kareche? Baluna, tomara tomadera pramana da'o. Eta'i, amara sathe ya ache tara upadesa ebam eta'i upadesa chila amara purbabartidera sathe ya chila tara [1]. Kintu tadera besira bhaga'i prakrta satya jane na, phale tara mukha phiriye neya.
21|25|Ara apanara purbe amara ye rasula'i prerana karechi tara kache e ohi'i pathiyechi ye, ami byatita an'ya kono satya ilaha ne'i, sutaram tomara amara'i ibadata kara.
21|26|Ara tara bale, ‘dayamaya (allah) santana grahana karechena.’ Tini pabitra mahana! Tara to tamra sam'manita banda.
21|27|Tara tamra age bere katha bale na [1]; tara to tamra adesa anusare'i kaja kare thake.
21|28|Tadera samane o pechane ya kichu ache ta saba'i tini janena. Ara tara suparisa kare sudhu tadera jan'ya'i yadera prati tini santusta ebam tara tamra bhaye bhita-santrasta [1].
21|29|Ara tadera madhye ye balabe, ‘tini byatita ami'i ilaha’, take amara jahannamera sastira pratidana deba; ebhabe'i amara yalemaderake pratidana diye thaki [1].

21|30|Yara kuphari kare tara ki dekhe na [1] ye, asamanasamuha o yamina mise chila otaprotabhabe, tarapara amara ubhayake prthaka kare dilama [2] ebam pranabana saba kichu srsti karalama pani theke [3]; tabu'o ki tara imana anabe na

21|31|Ebam amara prthibite srsti karechi sudrrha parbata, yate yamina taderake niye edika-odika dhale na yaya [1] ebam amara sekhane kare diyechi prasasta patha, yate tara gantabyasthale paumchate pare.
21|32|Ara amara akasake karechi suraksita chada; kintu tara akase abasthita nidarsanabali theke mukha phiriye neya.
21|33|Ara allaha'i srsti karechena rata o dina ebam surya o camda; pratyeke'i nija nija kaksapathe [1] bicarana kare.
21|34|Ara amara apanara age'o kono manusake ananta jibana dana karini [1]; kaje'i apanara mrtyu hale tara ki cirajibi haye thakabe
21|35|jibamatra'i mrtyura sbada grahana karabe [1]; amara tomaderake manda o bhalo dbara bisesabhabe pariksa kare thaki [2] ebam amadera'i kache tomara pratyabartita habe.

21|36|Ara yara kuphari kare, yakhana tara apanake dekhe, takhana tara apanake sudhu bidrupera patrarupe'i grahana kare. Tara bale, ‘e ki se, ye tomadera deba-debigulora samalocana kare? Athaca tara'i to ‘rahamana’ tatha dayamayera smarane kuphari kare [1].
21|37|Manusa srstigatabhabe tbaraprabana [1] sighra'i ami tomaderake amara nidarsanabali dekhaba; kaje'i tomara tarahura kamana karo na.
21|38|Ara tara bale, ‘tomara yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe bala e pratisruti kakhana purna habe?’

21|39|Yadi kapherara se samayera katha janata, yakhana tara tadera cehara o pitha theke aguna pratirodha karate parabe na ebam taderake sahayya kara'o habe na (tahale tara se sastike taratari ca'ita na).
21|40|Baram ta tadera upara asabe atarkitabhabe ebam taderake hatabhamba kare debe. Phale tara ta radha karate parabe na ebam taderake abakasa'o deya habe na.
21|41|Ara apanara age'o aneka rasulera sathe'i thatta-bidrupa kara hayechila; pariname tara ya niye thatta-bidrupa karata ta bidrupakariderake paribestana karechila.
21|42|Baluna, ‘rahamana hate ke tomaderake raksa karabe rate o dine [1]? Tabu'o tara tadera raba era smarana hate mukha phiriye neya.
21|43|Tabe ki tadera emana kateka ilaha'o ache yara amadera theke taderake raksa karate pare? Era to nijederake'i sahayya karate pare na ebam amadera theke tadera asrayadanakari'o habe na.

21|44|Baram amara'i taderake o tadera pitr-purusaderake bhoga-sambhara diyechilama; tara upara tadera ayuskala o hayechila dirgha. Tara ki dekhache na ye, amara yaminake caradika theke sankucita kare anachi [1]. Tabu'o ki tara bijayi habe.
21|45|Baluna, ami to sudhu ohi dbara'i tomaderake satarka kari, kintu yara badhira taderake yakhana satarka kara haya takhana tara se ahabana sune na.
21|46|Ara apanara raba era sastira kichumatra'o taderake sparsa karale tara abasya'i bale uthabe, ‘haya durbhoga amadera, amara to chilama yalema.

21|47|Ara kiyamatera dine amara n'yayabicarera pallasamuha sthapana karaba [1], sutaram karo prati kono yuluma kara habe na ebam kaja yadi sasya dana parimana ojanera'o haya tabu'o ta amara upasthita karaba; ara hiseba grahanakarirupe amara'i yathesta.
21|48|Ara abasya'i amara diyechilama [1] musa o harunake ‘phurakana’ jyoti o upadesa muttakidera jan'ya [2]
21|49|yara na dekhe'o tadera rabake bhaya kare ebam tara keyamata samparke bhita-santrasta.
21|50|Ara e hacche barakatamaya [1] upadesa, eta amara nayila karechi. Tabu'o ki tomara etake asbikara kara
21|51|ara amara to era age ibarahimake tara subhabud'dhi o satyajnana diyechilama [1] ebam amara tara sambandhe chilama samyaka parijnata.
21|52|Yakhana tini tara pita o tara sampradayake balalena, ‘e murtigulo ki yadera pujaya tomara rata rayecha!’
21|53|Tara balala, ‘amara amadera pitr purusaderake edera ‘ibadata karate dekhechi.’
21|54|Tini balalena, ‘abasya'i tomara nijera ebam tomadera pitrpurusara'o spasta bibhrantite acha.
21|55|Tara balala, ‘tumi ki amadera kache satya niye esecha, na tumi khela karacha [1]?’
21|56|Tini balalena, ‘baram tomadera raba to asamanasamuha o yaminera raba, yini segulo srsti karechena ebam e bisaye ami an'yatama saksi.’
21|57|Ara allahara sapatha, tomara pichane phire cale gele ami tomadera murtigulo sambandhe abasya'i kausala abalambana karaba [1].’
21|58|Atahpara tini curna-bicurna kare dilena murtiguloke, tadera pradhanati chara [1]; yate tara tara dike [2] phire ase.
21|59|Tara balala, ‘amadera mabudagulora prati erupa karala ke? Se niscaya'i an'yatama yalema.’
21|60|Lokera balala, ‘amara eka yubakake tadera samalocana karate sunechi; take bala haya ibarahima.’
21|61|Tara balala, ‘tahale take janasamakse upasthita kara, yate tara saksya haya [1].’
21|62|Tara balala, ‘he ibarahima! Tumi ki amadera mabudagulora prati erupa karecha?’
21|63|Tini balalena, ‘baram edera e pradhana-i to eta kareche [1], sutaram ederake jijnesa kara yadi era katha balate pare.’
21|64|Takhana tara nijera punarbibecana kare dekhala ebam eke an'yake balate lagala, ‘tomara'i to yalema.’
21|65|Tarapara tadera matha nata haye gela ebam tara balala, ‘tumi to jana'i ye, era katha bale na.’
21|66|Ibarahima balalena, ‘tabe ki tomara allahara paribarte emana kichura ‘ibadata kara ya tomadera kono upakara karate pare na ebam apakara'o karate pare na
21|67|‘dhika tomadera jan'ya ebam allahara paribarte tomara yadera ‘ibadata kara tadera jan'ya! Tabu'o ki tomara anudhabana karabe na?’
21|68|Tara balala, ‘take puriye phela, ara sahayya kara tomadera ma’budadera, tomara yadi kichu karate ca'o.’
21|69|Amara balalama, ‘he aguna! Tumi ibarahimera jan'ya sitala o nirapada haye ya'o.’
21|70|Ara tara tara ksati sadhanera iccha karechila. Kintu amara taderake'i sarbadhika ksatigrasta kare dilama.
21|71|Ebam amara take o lutake ud'dhara kare niye gelama se dese, yekhane amara kalyana rekhechi srstijagatera jan'ya [1].
21|72|Ebam amara ibarahimake dana karechilama isahaka ara atirikta puraskarasarupa iya’kubake [1] ebam pratyeke'i karechilama satkarmaparayana.

21|73|Ara amara taderake karechilama neta; tara amadera nirdesa anusare manusake sathika patha dekhate; ara amara taderake satkaja karate o salata kayema karate ebam yakata pradana karate ohi pathiyechilama; ebam tara amadera'i ibadatakari chila.

21|74|Ara lutake amara diyechilama prajna o jnana [1] ebam take ud'dhara karechilama emana eka janapada theke [2] yara adhibasira lipta chila aslila kaje [3]; niscaya tara chila eka manda phaseka sampradaya.
21|75|Ebam take amara amadera anugrahera antarbhukta karechilama; tini chilena satkarmaparayanadera an'yatama.
21|76|Ara smarana karuna nuhake; purbe tini yakhana dekechilena [1] takhana amara sara diyechilama tara dake ebam take o tara parijanabargake mahasankata [2] theke ud'dhara karechilama

21|77|ebam amara take sahayya karechilama se sampradayera birud'dhe yara amara nidarsanabalite mithyaropa karechila. Niscaya tara chila eka manda sampradaya. Ejan'ya amara tadera saba'ike'i nimajjita karechilama.

21|78|Ara smarana karuna da'uda o sulayamanake, yakhana tamra bicara karachilena sasyaksetra samparke; tate rate prabesa karechila kono sampradayera mesa; ara amara tadera bicara paryabeksana karachilama [1].

21|79|Atahpara amara sulayamanake e bisayera mimansa bujhiye diyechilama ebam tadera pratyekake amara diyechilama prajna o jnana [1]. Ara amara parbata o pakhiderake da'udera anugata kare diyechilama, tara tara sathe pabitrata o mahima ghosana karata [2], ara amara'i chilama e sabera karta.
21|80|Ara amara take tomadera jan'ya barma nirmana siksa diyechilama [1], yate ta tomadera yud'dhe tomaderake raksa kare; kaje'i tomara ki krtajna habe

21|81|ara sula'imanera basibhuta kare diyechilama prabala bayuke; seta tara adese se desera dike prabahita hata [1] yekhane amara prabhuta kalyana rekhechi [2]; ara pratyeka bisaya samparke amara'i jnani.
21|82|Ara sayatanadera madhye kichu sankhyaka tara jan'ya duburira kaja karata, e chara ana kaja'o karata [1]; ara amara tadera raksakari chilama.
21|83|Ara smarana karuna a'iyubake [1], yakhana tini tara rabake deke balechilena ami to duksi-kaste parechi, ara apani to sarbasrestha dayalu [2]!’

21|84|Atahpara amara tara dake sara dilama, tara duhkha-kasta dura kare dilama [1], take tara paribara-parijana phiriye dilama ebam aro dilama tadera sange tadera samaparimana, amadera paksa theke bisesa rahamatarupe ebam ibadatakaridera jan'ya upadesasbarupa.
21|85|Ebam smarana karuna isama'ila, idarisa o yulakiphalake, tadera pratyeke'i chilena dhairyasila [1]
21|86|ara amara taderake amadera anugrahe prabesa karalama; tara chilena satkarmaparayana.

21|87|Ara smarana karuna, yuna-nunake [1], yakhana tini krodha bhare [2] cale giyechilena ebam mane karechilena ye, amara take pakara'o karaba na [3]. Tarapara tini andhakare [4] e ahabana karechilena ye, ‘apani byatita kono satya ilaha ne'i; apani kata'ina pabitra o mahana, niscaya'i ami yalemadera antarbhukta haye gechi’ [5].
21|88|Takhana amara tara dake sara diyechilama ebam take duscinta hate ud'dhara karechilama, ara ebhabe'i amara muminaderake ud'dhara kare thaki [1].
21|89|Ara smarana karuna yakariyyake, yakhana tini tara rabake deke balechilena, ‘he amara raba! Amake eka (nihsantana) rekhe dibena na, apani to srestha oyarisa [1].’

21|90|Atahpara amara tara dake sara diyechilama ebam take dana karechilama iyaha'iya, ara tara jan'ya tara strike (garbhadharanera) yogya karechilama. Tara satkaje pratiyogita karata, ara tara amaderake dakata agraha o bhitira sathe ebam tara chila amadera nikata bhita-abanata [1].

21|91|Ebam smarana karuna se narike [1], ye nija lajjasthanera hephajata karechila, atahpara tara madhye amara amadera ruha [2] phumke dilama ebam take o tara putrake karechilama srstijagatera jan'ya eka nidarsana.
21|92|Niscaya tomadera e jati--- e to eka'i jati ebam ami'i tomadera raba, ata'eba tomara amara'i ibadata kara [1].
21|93|Kintu tara nijedera karyakalape parasparera madhye bibheda srsti kareche. Pratyeke'i amadera kache pratyabartanakari.
21|94|Kaje'i ke'u yadi mumina haye satkaja kare tara pracesta asbikara kara habe na ebam amara to tara lipibad'dhakari.
21|95|Ara ye janapadake amara dhbansa karechi tara samparke nisid'dha kara hayeche ye, tara adhibasira phire asabe na [1]
21|96|abasese yakhana iya’juja o ma’jujake mukti deya habe [1] ebam tara pratiti uccabhumi hate druta chute asabe [2].

21|97|Ara amogha pratisruta samaya nikatabarti habe, akasmat kapheradera caksu sthira haye yabe, tara balabe, ‘haya, durbhoga amadera! Amara to chilama e bisaye udasina; baram amara to chilama yalema [1].
21|98|Niscaya tomara ebam allahara paribarte tomara yadera ‘ibadata kara segulo to jahannamera indhana; tomara saba'i tate prabesa karabe.
21|99|Yadi tara ilaha hata tabe tara jahanname prabesa karata na; ara tadera saba'i tate sthayi habe
21|100|sekhane thakabe tadera nabhisbasera sabda [1] ebam sekhane tara kichu'i sunate pabe na
21|101|niscaya yadera jan'ya amadera kacha theke purba theke'i kalyana nirdharita rayeche taderake ta theke dure rakha habe [1].
21|102|Tara sesabera ksinatama sabda'o sunabe na [1] ebam sekhane tara cirakala thakabe tadera manera basana anuyayi.
21|103|Mahabhiti [1] taderake cintanbita karabe na ebam phirisatagana taderake abhyarthana karabe e bale, ‘e tomadera se dina yara pratisruti tomaderake deya hayechila.

21|104|Sedina amara asamanasamuhake gutiye phelaba, yebhabe gutano haya likhita daphatara [1]; yebhabe amara prathama srstira sucana karechilama sebhabe punaraya srsti karaba; eta amara krta pratisruti, ara amara ta palana karaba'i.
21|105|Ara abasya'i amara ‘yikara’ era para yabure [1] likhe diyechi ye, yaminera [2] adhikari habe amara yogya bandagana'i.
21|106|Niscaya ete rayeche ibadatakari sampradayera jan'ya paryapta bisayabastu.
21|107|Ara amara to apanake srstikulera jan'ya sudhu rahamatarupe'i pathiyechi [1]
21|108|baluna, ‘amara prati ohi haya ye, tomadera ilaha eka ilaha, sutaram tomara ki atmasamarpanakari habe

21|109|atahpara tara mukha phiriye nile apani balabena, ‘ami tomaderake yathayathabhabe janiye diyechi ebam tomaderake ye bisayera pratisruti deya hayeche [1], ami jani na, ta ki khuba kache, naki ta dure.
21|110|Niscaya tini janena ye katha sasabde bala ebam tini janena ya tomara gopana kara [1].
21|111|‘Ara ami jani na hayata eta tomadera jan'ya eka pariksa ebam jibanopabhoga kichu kalera jan'ya [1]
21|112|rasula balechilana, ‘he amara raba! Apani n'yayera sathe phayasala kare dina, ara amadera raba to dayamaya, tomara ya sabyasta karacha se bisaye ekamatra sahayasthala tini'i.’
